## Description {#details}

Insertion point before or after an instruction.

## Public Member Functions

### canMaterialize() {#a62245784637a216888785f1517944d0e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::canMaterialize () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether this insertion point can be materialized.

As soon as <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#a7a0275cf0b23f61fed8b27a60dd950a5">getPoint</a> is called and thus, the point materialized calling this method does not make sense.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00233">233</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### frequency() {#acfe02f412f4221fbb6a31ca758ac297e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::frequency (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> &amp; P) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Frequency of the insertion point.

<code>P</code> is used to access the various analysis that will help to get that information, like <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo">MachineBlockFrequencyInfo</a>. If <code>P</code> does not contain enough to return the actual frequency, this returns 1.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00230">230</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00919">919</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isSplit() {#a8bf99289cea710aff85335a6cc7aefb6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::isSplit () const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Does this point involve splitting an edge or block?

As soon as <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#a7a0275cf0b23f61fed8b27a60dd950a5">getPoint</a> is called and thus, the point materialized, the point will not require splitting anymore, i.e., this will return false.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00229">229</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00910">910</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### materialize() {#af9fca3e14242c876cbb24f199eb947ca}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::materialize ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Materialize the insertion point.

If <a href="#a8bf99289cea710aff85335a6cc7aefb6">isSplit()</a> is true, this involves actually splitting the block or edge.


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#af81657c35d5dd8aea4fc76cf2566d6a0">getPointImpl()</a> returns a valid iterator.
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#a4acd081c2e07b76bc2d5a5b5144ea937">getInsertMBBImpl()</a> returns a valid basic block.
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
<a href="#a8bf99289cea710aff85335a6cc7aefb6">isSplit()</a> == false ; no more splitting should be required.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00212">212</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00888">888</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
